description: A popular narrow-spectrum antibiotic contained inside an opaque gelatin capsule.  The capsule has a blue cap and a salmon-colored body.  On one of the sides, "742" is imprinted, along with "250 mg", indicating the dosage.  Has a low chance to stifle or cure bacterial infections.  One dose lasts 12 hours.
//variants: sold commercially as Vancomycin Hydrochloride, including by Akorn

description: A broad-spectrum antibiotic contained inside an opaque gelatin capsule.  The capsule has a gray cap and a yellow body.  Around the cap, "MINOCYCLINE 100" is imprinted, indicating the dosage. On the body, the imprint says "DAN 5695".  It is very effective against bacterial infection, boosting your chances of recovery significantly.  One dose lasts 12 hours.
//variants: appears to be sold as Minocycline commercially by Actavis
other brand names include Dynacin, Minocin, Minocin PAC, Minolira, Solodyn, Ximino, Vectrin, Myrac

description: A powerful antifungal drug inside an opaque gelatin capsule.  The capsule has a blue cap and an off-white body.  Around the cap, "NL771" is imprinted.  On the body, the print says "250", indicating the dosage.  It is very effective against fungal infections, boosting your chances of recovery significantly.  One dose lasts 12 hours.
//variants: commerically sold by Valeant(?) as Ancobon
Valeant has for a long time maintained a monopoly on this drug, making it ridiculously-expensive
//price: we take the cheapest possible price (30 [5 × 6] capsules), which is still $32.19 (as of Jan 2024)
//price_postapoc: high barter price per pill due to very limited availability even prior to Cataclysm

description: A prescription-grade antidepressant inside an opaque gelatin capsule.  The capsule has a light-green cap and a yellowish-white body.  On both the body and the cap, "Lilly 3105" is imprinted.  The drug offsets the mood negatives of a depression.  Caution is advised when taking the antidepressant, as it has potential for forming a habit.
//variants: other brand names include Sarafem, Rapiflux, Selfemra
//container: a common package appears to be 2 × 14-pill blister pack
//price: price for a 20 mg formulation in 30-capsule bottle
